Question Text: Payment refused by paricipant from any site
Notes: Repeated measure associated with Round, for display on the study manager dashboard, indicates if payment was refused by any participant
Derivation Notes: If BioFin_UoCPaymRef_v1r0 equals 1 or HDPaym_PaymRefused_v1r0 equals 1 then SMPaym_JointRefused_v1r0 equals 1
